At the end of each month, the number of trash units taken out by each roommate will be revealed, and the roommates will have an opportunity to communicate with each other. They can use this as an opportunity to negotiate and persuade others to influence their behavior in the next month. For example, if there are 90 units of trash at the beginning of the month and the five roommates take out a total of 90 units, there will be 0 units left at the end of the month before regeneration, and 50 units after regeneration.
